quote: “Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves.”
author: Horace Mann

quote: “Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “These mountains that you are carrying, you were only supposed to climb.”
author: Najwa Zebian

quote: “Never let fear hold you captive. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. Never let frustration hold you captive.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Goals are the road maps that guide you to your destination. Cultivate the habit of setting clearly-defined written goals; they are the road maps that guide you to your destination.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “Time to toss the dice”
author: robert jordan

quote: “What's unnatural is homophobia. Homo sapiens is the only species in all of nature that responds with hate to homosexuality.”
author: Alex Sanchez

quote: “To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.”
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: “Tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense.”
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: “Freedom is not having everything we crave, it's being able to go without the things we crave and being OK with it. ”
author: Rob Bell

quote: “The sun shall always rise upon a new day and there shall always be a rose garden within me. Yes, there is a part of me that is broken, but my broken soil gives way to my wild roses.”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.”
author: William Wordsworth

quote: “Time cannot be packaged and ribboned and left under trees for christmas morning.Time can't be given.But it can be shared”
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: “Too many locks, not enough keys.”
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: “Happiness is not having what you want, it is wanting what you have.”
author: Sheryl Crow

quote: “you cannot find happiness, outside the plan of happiness!”
author: John Bytheway

quote: “Those who have a strong sense of love and belonging have the courage to be imperfect.”
author: Brené Brown

quote: “Survivors can't always choose their methods.”
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: “When you get ill do not get nervous about it and try as much as possible to be hopeful.”
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: “Love is not liking somebody. Anyone can do that. Love is loving things that sometimes you don't like. ”
author: Ajahn Brahm

quote: “Without the gods, how would I sing?' I asked.With your own voice,' he said.”
author: Erica Jong

quote: “You might have lost some major battles, but you survived and you're still here.”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “I believe that life is a prize, but to live doesn't mean you're alive.”
author: Nicki Minaj
